benchmark_details.name: VS-TDX
benchmark_details.overview: The VS-TDX benchmark is designed to evaluate VLMsâ€™ sensor-specific reasoning and perception capabilities across multiple vision sensor modalities, specifically thermal, depth, and X-ray images.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To rigorously evaluate vision-language models' sensor-specific understanding across diverse vision sensor modalities.

data.source: Curated from 13 publicly available datasets spanning thermal, depth, and X-ray modalities.
data.annotation: Reviewed and refined by human annotators.

methodology.calculation: Evaluated based on average accuracy across multiple tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Performance is computed as accuracy per sensor modality.
